Key: (Ah, I'm tired.)

(Man, as to whoever attacked Tengu Tower...
Who could it have been? I wonder if the Spirits
have something to do with it.)

(I don't know. I guess I should leave these
things to Kotori.)

(There's one thing I do know, though. It
might be just a misunderstanding, but...)

(Something is off. I can sense something's...
just off. I thought it was just a side-effect of
recovering, but that just can't be.)

(I can sense something's off, but it's become
natural for everyone else. At the same time,
I can't say for certain that I'm right.)

(But what if this sense is actually right?
What if everyone's just gone mad? What then?)

(What if there's a Spirit who holds such a
power?)

(If I said this aloud, I feel like Kotori would
mock me.)

(What I need to do is... go on dates with
Tohka, Yoshino, and the others so they
won't go berserk.)

(Regardless, Tohka's seemed a bit off lately,
too...)

(Yeah, I guess I should be focusing on the
task at hand.)

(What I need to do is... go on dates with
Tohka, Yoshino, and the others so they
won't go berserk. And Origami, too.)
(I should just focus on the task at hand.)

won't go berserk.)
